definition: to appoint a general (in theater)/fig. to appoint sb for a task

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: If the cutover is successful, the old node is decommissioned.
sentences.chinese: 如果切換成功，舊的節點將退役。

sentences.english: Hero's classes will be held at the Ruskin School of Drawing and Fine Art.
sentences.chinese: 赫羅的上課地點將在拉斯金繪畫和美術學院。

sentences.english: As I was writing this article I was wondering what your perspective would be on Shalom .
sentences.chinese: 正如我在寫這篇文章我想知道您的觀點將沙洛姆。

sentences.english: After consulting the LIB , the MPLS node forwards the packet toward its destination.
sentences.chinese: 之後，MPLS節點將包轉發給它的目的地。

sentences.english: These polarized views could slow down the discussion considerably.
sentences.chinese: 這些極化的觀點將拖慢討論較多。

sentences.english: The place you choose could determine that.
sentences.chinese: 你所選擇的居住地點將會決定這些。

sentences.english: What Will the Singularity Look Like?
sentences.chinese: 這個奇點將會是怎樣的？

sentences.english: The second approach will put you into exactly the most risky stocks on the list.
sentences.chinese: 第二點將會讓你買入名單上風險最大的那些股票。

sentences.english: This means that any isolated node releases resources it would otherwise own.
sentences.chinese: 這指的是任何單獨的節點將釋放它所擁有的資源。

sentences.english: But that's going to change over time.
sentences.chinese: 但是，隨着時間的推移，這一點將會改變。

sentences.english: These ideas will be examined in more detail in Chapter 10.
sentences.chinese: 這些觀點將在第十章作更爲詳細的探討。

sentences.english: The focus will shift to a game of who's who in the next administration.
sentences.chinese: 焦點將放在下屆特區政府的估領袖遊戲。

sentences.english: See cheng bite gold was almost will face posted on their own feet.
sentences.chinese: 看到程咬金竟然差點將臉貼到自己的腳丫上。

sentences.english: The seven winners will be announced July 7 in Lisbon, Portugal.
sentences.chinese: 獲勝的七大景點將於7月7日在葡萄牙里斯本宣佈。

sentences.english: When you zoom out on the map, resource-gathering locations will be marked with their corresponding icons.
sentences.chinese: 當你放大縮小地圖，資源採集地點將標有相應的圖標。

sentences.english: When you select the task, the offending node will be highlighted.
sentences.chinese: 當您選擇任務時，存在錯誤的節點將被突出顯示。

definition: (of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
to turn white-hot/to intensify/to reach a climax
